catList: At this level, students consolidate their language.They will read a variety of text types, from newspaper and magazine articles to adverts.The content of the learning materials includes many everyday topics that provoke lively discussion and encourage the learners to express their opinion.

This course is a continuation of FRE 301 where students consolidate their language knowledge and are provided with opportunities to practice their language skills. They work with a variety of text types, including newspaper and magazine articles. The content of the learning materials focuses on many everyday topics that stimulate lively discussion, encouraging students to express their opinions freely.
